summary: The module implements a Qt widget that presents detailed information about files in the preview pane of the TagStudio application. It builds a vertical layout with labels showing the file name, type, size, creation and modification dates, and provides methods to refresh these values, aggregate data when multiple files are selected, and display statistical summaries such as total size and media‑category counts. It integrates with the core library model and uses helper utilities for opening files and formatting sizes.
business_intent: Enable users to quickly inspect and understand the properties of one or more selected files, supporting efficient file management and decision‑making within the TagStudio environment.
